problem.title: I don't want to be unnoticed if something goes wrong

bullet1.strong: Living alone means there's no one nearby to notice
bullet1.regular: if I fall, get sick, or have an emergency. It could take a long time before anyone realizes something is wrong.

bullet2.strong: My loved ones and I are often busy,
bullet2.regular: and daily phone calls or texts are not always realistic. But I do want them to know if I go silent for too long.

bullet3.strong: I value my privacy and don't want surveillance.
bullet3.regular: I want help to be available if needed, but I don't want cameras, constant tracking, or anyone watching what I do day-to-day.

problem.closing: SafeCircle gives you safety without surveillance—peace of mind for you and your loved ones, without compromising your independence or privacy.

howitworks.title: Simple. Private. In your control.
howitworks.subtitle: By default, SafeCircle only uses your smartphone. It collects the minimum information needed to let your loved ones know that everything seems fine. No buttons to press, no devices to remember.

feature1.title: Maximum reassurance with minimal data collection
feature1.description: No cameras, no audio, no surveillance. Only simple activity signals like unlocking your phone, less data than most apps collect. Or share nothing at all and use push notifications only.

feature2.title: Your loved ones get the right information at the right time
feature2.description: When all is well, contacts who have installed the app see simple confirmation. If something seems off, they can get helpful details like last activity or location via the app, WhatsApp, SMS, or email. You control what's shared and when.

feature3.title: Full control over how monitoring works for you
feature3.description: Pause monitoring anytime. Choose how long before alerts are sent. Or use push-notification-only mode to confirm you're okay without sharing data.

selling1.title: Smartphone-only monitoring
selling1.description: Quietly tracks patterns of activity on your phone. No extra devices needed.

button.show: What do we mean with monitoring?

section1.title: We collect the minimum information needed
section1.p1: SafeCircle monitors simple activity signals—like when you unlock your phone, turn on a light, or interact with connected devices. We don't record what you're doing, who you're talking to, or what's on your screen.
section1.p2: Think of it like a motion sensor in a room: it knows someone is present and active, but nothing about what they're actually doing. That's all SafeCircle needs to know you're going about your normal routine.
section1.p3: We use these signals to learn your typical daily patterns—when you're usually active, when you typically rest. If that pattern continues normally, your trusted contacts see a simple "all is well" confirmation. If the pattern breaks unexpectedly, they're notified.

section2.title: Monitoring vs. Surveillance

surveillance.title: Surveillance tracks what you do:
surveillance.text: Cameras watching you, GPS tracking your exact location, recording conversations, logging websites you visit, or monitoring who you communicate with. It's invasive and creates a detailed record of your life.

safecircle.title: SafeCircle monitors that you're active:
safecircle.text: Simple signals that indicate activity is happening—nothing about what that activity is. No cameras, no audio, no detailed tracking. Just enough to know your routine continues normally, or when it doesn't.

section2.keydifference: The key difference: Surveillance tells someone everything about your life. SafeCircle only signals whether your routine seems normal or if something might be wrong—giving you privacy while still providing reassurance.

trustedcontacts.title: For Trusted Contacts
trustedcontacts.subtitle: Being designated as a trusted contact means you're there when it matters most. Without consistently asking if everything is fine.

state1.description: Install the app to see everything is fine. If you're loved one is going about their day you see that nothing unusual is detected.

state2.description: If something seems off, you receive an alert with helpful information. If you choose not to install the app, you get alerts via SMS.

whyitmatters.title: Effortless reassurance
whyitmatters.subtitle: Many people put off organizing or sharing health and safety info. SafeCircle lowers the threshold: it's easy to set up, runs on autopilot, and ensures loved ones know you're okay without pressure or surveillance.

perfectfor.title: It's perfect for:
perfectfor.item1: Adults living alone who want independence and safety without wearing devices like emergency buttons or smartwatches
perfectfor.item2: Loved ones who want reassurance but lack time for frequent check-ins or worry about being intrusive

howitworks.title: How it works
howitworks.step1: SafeCircle learns your normal daily patterns using your phone and any smart devices you already have. It observes that activity is happening during your typical routine. Not what you're doing or where you are. SafeCircle uses minimal data collection, less than many popular apps.
howitworks.step2: Each day, when your activity matches your normal pattern, SafeCircle automatically marks you as checked in. If your trusted contacts have installed the app, they see quiet confirmation that you're going about your day. If not, no news is good news.
howitworks.step3: If your routine changes significantly (for example, no activity is detected for an unusual length of time) SafeCircle waits a period you decide, then alerts your trusted contacts via the app, SMS, WhatsApp, or email. They can reach out to you directly.
howitworks.step4: You can manually check in anytime, adjust your settings, or pause monitoring when you're traveling or your schedule changes.

item1.title: Not emergency services.
item1.text: SafeCircle alerts your contacts, not 911. It's designed for peace of mind, not crisis response.

item2.title: Not medical monitoring.
item2.text: It doesn't track health metrics, fall detection, or vital signs. It observes general activity patterns only.

item3.title: Not surveillance.
item3.text: No cameras, no constant tracking, no recording of what you're doing. Just pattern recognition from devices you already use.

q1.question: Will I need to remember to check in daily?
q1.answer: No. SafeCircle works passively in the background. There are no buttons to press, no daily tasks, and nothing to remember.

q2.question: How is my information protected?
q2.answer: Your data is encrypted with bank-level security. You control exactly who can access what, and when. Your information is never shared without your permission.

q3.question: Do my trusted contacts need to install the app?
q3.answer: No. Your trusted contacts can receive alerts via SMS, WhatsApp, or email. Installing the app gives them access to a dashboard for reassurance, but it's completely optional.

q4.question: What if I go on vacation or change my routine?
q4.answer: You can easily pause monitoring or adjust your routine settings anytime. SafeCircle adapts to your life, not the other way around.

q5.question: How does the 14-day money-back guarantee work?
q5.answer: Try SafeCircle risk-free for 14 days. If you're not satisfied for any reason, simply cancel your subscription in the app within 14 days of your purchase and you'll automatically receive a full refund—no questions asked, no need to contact us.
